Pre-Game Insights: The Tampa Bay Rays and the Detroit Tigers meet Thursday in MLB action from Comerica Park.
This will be the final installment in a three-game series.
Reese Olson will start for Detroit on Thursday. So far Olson is 4-8 with a 3.49 ERA in 21 starts.
Tyler Alexander will start for the Rays. This year Alexander is 6-5 with a 5.35 ERA and 84 Ks.
Each of the Rays' last five-day games against American League opponents has gone UNDER the total runs line.
Five of the Tigers' last six-day games against AL East opponents have gone UNDER the total runs line.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Tigers' last eight-day games against American League opponents.
The 'Inning 1 UNDER 0.5 runs' market has hit in each of the Rays' last five-day games.
Javier Baez has recorded at least one hit in each of his last 10 Thursday-day appearances.
Spencer Torkelson has hit a home run in each of the Tigers' last two games at Comerica Park against AL East opponents that held a losing record.
Javier Baez has recorded at least one total base in each of his last 10 Thursday-day appearances.
Wenceel Perez has scored a run in eight of his last nine appearances against AL opponents that held a losing record.
Spencer Torkelson has recorded at least one RBI in four of his last five home appearances against opponents that held a losing record.
Kerry Carpenter has recorded a Single in eight of his last nine appearances against AL opponents that held a losing record.
Yandy Diaz has recorded at least one Single in seven of his last eight road appearances against opponents that held a winning record.
Brandon Lowe has recorded at least one hit in 10 of his last 11 appearances in day games against teams that held a winning record.
Brandon Lowe has hit a home run in two of the Rays' last three road games against the Tigers.
Brandon Lowe has recorded at least one total base in 10 of his last 11 appearances in day games against teams that held a winning record.
Brandon Lowe has scored at least one run in four of his last five appearances against the Tigers.
